Node.definition: = a human being, as defined by the life principle that animates him/her
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether or not on purpose, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution

= action by which the name of a deity is invoked and asked to punish a wrong doer; ◄ contexts in which this may happen include: (1) covenants and agreements, where the deity is asked to punish those who do not obey the terms of the agreement, (2) cases where a supposedly wrongful act has been committed, but where there is not enough certainty about the identity of the person who is responsible, and (3) in order to prevent people from committing a wrongful action, knowing that the deity's punishment will be upon them if they do so
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= a person or deity who has evidence that something has taken place or that some decision has been made
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
literally: to hold; hence: = process by which humans are held responsible for a certain action or for the well being of others
= a deed of deliberate wrongdoing resulting in a state of guilt which requires punishment
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= a human being, as defined by the life principle that animates him/her
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= process or action by which the hand or another part of the body of humans gets in brief contact with an object, either or not deliberately
= state in which humans, animals, or objects are regarded by the law as having been contaminated, ► as a result of which they cannot participate in social and religious activities
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= the dead body of humans or animals
possibly shortened form of נֶפֶשׁ חַיָּה living creature: = animal; ◄ generic, sometimes referring to all animals, sometimes limited to wild land animals only
= state in which humans, animals, or objects are regarded by the law as having been contaminated, ► as a result of which they cannot participate in social and religious activities
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= the dead body of humans or animals
= general term for any animal that has been domesticated; ≈ considered part of someone's wealth
= state in which humans, animals, or objects are regarded by the law as having been contaminated, ► as a result of which they cannot participate in social and religious activities
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= the dead body of humans or animals
= state in which humans, animals, or objects are regarded by the law as having been contaminated, ► as a result of which they cannot participate in social and religious activities
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= state in which humans, animals, or objects are regarded by the law as having been contaminated, ► as a result of which they cannot participate in social and religious activities

Node.gloss: to be guilty|to be in the wrong|to have wronged
Node.definition: = to bear the responsiblity for an unlawful deed, that was committed either knowingly or unknowingly
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= process or action by which the hand or another part of the body of humans gets in brief contact with an object, either or not deliberately

= something that causes humans, animals, or objects to be regarded by the law as having been contaminated, as a result of which anything that touches them may become contaminated as well; ► humans, animals, and objects that are unclean cannot participate in social and religious activities, until this state is reversed through prescribed rituals and procedures
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality

= something that causes humans, animals, or objects to be regarded by the law as having been contaminated, as a result of which anything that touches them may become contaminated as well; ► humans, animals, and objects that are unclean cannot participate in social and religious activities, until this state is reversed through prescribed rituals and procedures
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= process by which humans, or objects are or become contaminated, ◄ as a result of contagious diseases or conditions, unlawful activities, or contact with what has been contaminated, ► which often results in their inability of being used or participating in social and religious activities, until this state is reversed through prescribed rituals and procedures
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

Node.gloss: to be guilty|to be in the wrong|to have wronged
Node.definition: = to bear the responsiblity for an unlawful deed, that was committed either knowingly or unknowingly
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= a human being, as defined by the life principle that animates him/her
= action by which humans or deities make a solemn statement often calling on a higher power to confirm that what is said is true or to punish the speaker if it turns out not to be true
= action by which humans speak without due consideration as to attitude or content

Node.gloss: to act wickedly|to do wickedness|to do evil
Node.definition: = action by which humans behave in an evil or harmful way
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= action by which humans or deities act in a way that is morally and/or ethically right
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which humans speak without due consideration as to attitude or content
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
= action by which humans or deities make a solemn statement often calling on a higher power to confirm that what is said is true or to punish the speaker if it turns out not to be true
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

Node.gloss: to be guilty|to be in the wrong|to have wronged
Node.definition: = to bear the responsiblity for an unlawful deed, that was committed either knowingly or unknowingly
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

Node.gloss: to be guilty|to be in the wrong|to have wronged
Node.definition: = to bear the responsiblity for an unlawful deed, that was committed either knowingly or unknowingly
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= action by which humans publicly admit their own shortcomings before God, or the shortcomings of the people they represent
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether or not on purpose, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= sacrifice brought to compensate for what the deity should have received, but what was not given
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether on purpose or not, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether or not on purpose, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
= person or animal belonging to the female sex

= group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd
= female young of a sheep (שֶׂה) ► clean animal, and allowed for food; also used for sacrifice
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option

= a fairly small, female domestic animal, usually black and with floppy ears, hooves and long hair, and usually found in one single flock (צֹאן) with sheep; ► raised for its hair, occasionally used for sacrifices; a clean animal and therefore to be eaten

= a fairly small, female domestic animal, usually black and with floppy ears, hooves and relatively short hair, and usually found in one single flock (צֹאן) with sheep; ► raised for its milk, meat, and skin; a clean animal and therefore to be eaten
= action by which a human being performs the sacrificial ritual that is intended to remove the state of guilt from oneself or someone else

= causative action by which a priest performs the rituals that are required to remove guilt or uncleanness from people or objects, which usually requires a blood sacrifice, or another form of compensation
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether on purpose or not, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
literally: (one's) hand touches (a certain amount); hence: = state in which one has enough financial means to purchase something
literally: (one's) hand touches enough (to do something); hence: = state in which someone has sufficient resources to carry out a certain task
= state of being sufficient in quantity for a given purpose
= male or female herbivorous mammal with four legs; ◄ |iovis ladicaudata|i*, fat tailed sheep; ► clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, hides, wool, and horns

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= sacrifice brought to compensate for what the deity should have received, but what was not given
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether or not on purpose, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
= state in which a countable entity is two in number

= a bird with a blue gray color with a pinkish sheen to the neck feathers and a black tip on its tail; lives in large colonies and eats mainly seeds; courts, mates, and has nests several times a year; nests on rock ledges; ◄ |iColumba livia|i*; ► used as food and for sacrifices; ≈ regarded as swift, docile, and innocent, but also as silly and senseless; associated with affection, fertility and sexuality because of its mating habits; the moaning sound this bird sometimes makes is associated with pain and suffering
= particle linking two entities by which X and Y are alternative options that exclude each other
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= direct offspring of animals, either male or indeterminate

= a bird with a blue gray color with a pinkish sheen to the neck feathers and a black tip on its tail; lives in large colonies and eats mainly seeds; courts, mates, and has nests several times a year; nests on rock ledges; ◄ |iColumba livia|i*; ► used as food and for sacrifices; ≈ regarded as swift, docile, and innocent, but also as silly and senseless; associated with affection, fertility and sexuality because of its mating habits; the moaning sound this bird sometimes makes is associated with pain and suffering
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= action by which a human being performs the sacrificial ritual that is intended to remove the state of guilt from oneself or someone else
= state in which a countable entity is one in number

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= causative action by which humans cause other humans or animals to move to a location relatively close to the location in focus

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= action by which a human being performs the sacrificial ritual that is intended to remove the state of guilt from oneself or someone else
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= relational linking an event to a location right in front of another location

= action by which part of an entity is separated from the rest, either by detaching it completely it or by creating a kind of barrier (visible or invisible) between the selected part and the rest of the entity

= red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of life (נֶפֶשׁ) human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land
= action by which a human being performs the sacrificial ritual that is intended to remove the state of guilt from oneself or someone else
= flat construction, ◄ normally made of stone, ► used as a divider of spaces, or to enclose a space
= construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices

= red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of life (נֶפֶשׁ) human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land
= the bottom part of a construction, which bears everything built on top of it
= construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices
= action by which a human being performs the sacrificial ritual that is intended to remove the state of guilt from oneself or someone else
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state in which a countable entity is the second in a range
literally: to make (ready); hence: = causative action by which humans take an object and do what needs to be done to make it ready for a certain purpose
literally: a ruling or decision; hence: = a law or ordinance handed down by a ruler or a deity that a particular group of people is expected to obey

= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
literally: (one's) hand catches up (with something); hence: = state in which someone has sufficient resources to carry out a certain task

= state in which a countable entity is two in number

= a bird with a blue gray color with a pinkish sheen to the neck feathers and a black tip on its tail; lives in large colonies and eats mainly seeds; courts, mates, and has nests several times a year; nests on rock ledges; ◄ |iColumba livia|i*; ► used as food and for sacrifices; ≈ regarded as swift, docile, and innocent, but also as silly and senseless; associated with affection, fertility and sexuality because of its mating habits; the moaning sound this bird sometimes makes is associated with pain and suffering

= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether or not on purpose, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
= a unit of dry measure of which the exact quantity is unknown and ranges between 20 and 40 liters; one ephah equals 10 omer (עֹמֶר)
= finely ground flour ◄ from only the inner kernel of the wheat, resulting in a high quality flour
= action by which a human being performs the sacrificial ritual that is intended to remove the state of guilt from oneself or someone else

Node.gloss: to place|to put|to lay|to set|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause objects or (other) humans to be located in a certain place

= high quality oil (שֶׁמֶן) ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness
= action by which a human being performs the sacrificial ritual that is intended to remove the state of guilt from oneself or someone else
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= action by which humans fill their hand with the amount of material that it can contain (קֹמֶץ)
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= a certain quantity that fill a certain container
= amount of material that can be held in the palm of the hand

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= relatively small part of a larger quantity of substance offered in sacrifice which is burnt on the altar as a token representing the entire quantity
= causative action by which humans set alight and cause smoke to rise from the sacrificial fat parts of an animal, of grain and other offerings, including incense ► as an offering to a deity
= construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices
= action by which humans offer something to a deity by burning it partially or in its entirety on the altar; considered to have a pleasing aroma

= action by which a human being performs the sacrificial ritual that is intended to remove the state of guilt from oneself or someone else

= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= an offering consisting of grain or a grain product, which usually accompanies an animal sacrifice

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option
= process by which humans or objects come upon (other) humans or objects without searching
= object that is not located in the place where it is expected to be
= action by which humans say things that are not true in order to deceive or mislead others
= action by which humans or deities make a solemn statement often calling on a higher power to confirm that what is said is true or to punish the speaker if it turns out not to be true
literally: falsehood; hence: = state in which things that are being communicated are factually untrue
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= human being as an individual or as a class of living creatures; sometimes explicitly subdivided between male (זָכָר) and female (נְקֵבָה) ≈ associated with mortality
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether or not on purpose, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution
= action by which a human being commits a wrongful act against God or someone else, whether or not on purpose, ► which may require atonement, restitution, and/or retribution

Node.gloss: to be guilty|to be in the wrong|to have wronged
Node.definition: = to bear the responsiblity for an unlawful deed, that was committed either knowingly or unknowingly

Node.gloss: to take back|to bring back|to return|to put back|to restore (something)
Node.definition: literally: to turn; hence: = causative action by which animals, humans, deities cause (other) animals, humans, or objects to move back to a location where they have been before

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= objects taken unlawfully from a person or place, usually by force or threat of force
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option

= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= something that has been set apart for someone else to take care of or for later use
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= causative action by which humans hand over an object to (other) humans or deities ► giving them the responsibility for keeping it in a good condition
particle linking two entities and denoting that X and Y function as one single entity in the proposition in focus
= particle linking two entities by which Y is added to X as an additional option

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

literally: falsehood; hence: = state in which things that are being communicated are factually untrue

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: head; hence: = the total number of a group of objects or people
= state in which an entity is one out of five equal parts
= action by which humans or deities add to an existing number of entities
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= sacrifice brought to compensate for what the deity should have received, but what was not given

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= sacrifice brought to compensate for what the deity should have received, but what was not given
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= male herbivorous mammal with four legs; ◄ |iovis ladicaudata|i*, fat tailed sheep; ► clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, hides, wool, and horns; ≈ associated with strength and leadership

= group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd
= sacrifice brought to compensate for what the deity should have received, but what was not given
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others

= causative action by which a priest performs the rituals that are required to remove guilt or uncleanness from people or objects, which usually requires a blood sacrifice, or another form of compensation
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
